pkgmetadata.longdescription: Patterned Fills for 'ggplot2' and 'grid' Graphics // Adds distinctive yet unobtrusive geometric patterns where solid color fills are normally used. Patterned figures look just as professional when viewed by colorblind readers or when printed in black and white. The dozen included patterns can be customized in terms of scale, rotation, color, fill, line type, and line width. Compatible with the 'ggplot2' package as well as 'grid' graphics.
